reviews.text: I would recommend this business to anyone! Saying that I am pleased, would be an understatement. Customer service is amazing! He definitely went out of his way to respond about any of my concerns and was so emphatic! He actually cares about his customers well being and that is RARE. He made sure the repairs/replacements were handled for me the same day parts arrived! After 5 years, my home is finally feeling amazing. Thanks to Tony & Everyone who is apart of TSquare! Stay blessed & I pray much more success to this business. So deserving!

reviews.text: I am very thankful that it was Tony from T Square that came out to service our AC today. He is very professional and got right to the problem and fixed it.  It's usually hit or miss with Home Warranty.  Tony is definitely a HIT.

reviews.author: Keith Garrett
reviews.text:
I called T Square after having another very large company do an eval and give me a quote to repair my AC. I felt like I was being scammed and wanted a second opinion. T Square promised me they'd see me at 11am today, they didn't lie. They looked at the issue, diagnosed it, and fixed it without trying to sell me parts and units that I didn't need.

They were professional, knowledgeable, and personable. Plenty of people would try to take advantage of the recent heat wave and know that people are desperate for working AC, but that's not how T Square handled it. They were very straightforward, explained the issue once it was diagnosed, and showed the fix. Afterwards, they checked to be sure everything was working, tested the temperature, and made sure I was satisfied with the job.

I can't say enough good things about these guys. I'm glad I found them. Having AC problems is awful, finding good service is usually worse. Do yourself a favor and call T Square. It's too hot to get jerked around by crooks.

reviews.author: C R
reviews.text:
T Square was the third companyÂ to come out to our residence.Â  The first company that came out, not only were they unable to resolve the issue, they also caused more serious issues.Â  The second company saw theÂ mess that the first company made and didn't evenÂ want to touch it.Â  Fortunately, a trusted colleague provided me with T Square's contact information.Â  Not only was T Square able to diagnose and repair the issue, they did so promptly and professionally.Â  Unfortunately, in this day and age, many companies no longer value their (potential) clients - many companies won't show up and if they do, they are hours late - without the courtesy of a phone call.

We have been extremely impressed with T Square.Â  Not only does Tony exemplify that he values his clients but he also is knowledgeable, has integrity coupled with an impeccableÂ work ethic.Â  T Square is the ONLY HVAC company that we will use now.

Tony is absolutely the best kept secret in Alabama.Â  We support his business and I cannot wait untilÂ Birmingham and surrounding areas are blanketed with T Square trucks.Â  We wish you much success with your business Tony!Â  You absolutely deserve it.

reviews.text: We found 911 Air on a 2nd opinion request from our home warranty company. Our system was on its last leg and we knew it. Without hesitation, they did extra work for no cost that wasn't included in the initial quote. Really great company. Very impressed with the honesty, professionalism, and customer service. Ricky installed and services our system and can't say enough good things.

The prices he charges are very reasonable and the service is top notch.  He just replaced my 4 ton AC system at my home, but that was my choice.  I chose the new system over a repair that I could have made to my 11 year old system.  It is very nice to have an HVAC company (and a contractor in general) that I can trust.

The first impression was a knowledgeable and friendly staff with a very professional truck and equipment. I was prepared for the worst but after a thorough inspection it was diagnosed as a bad starter capacitor. The brand that Taylor uses has a 5 year warranty. Itâ€™s unheard of for electronic/electric parts to have any warranty but Taylor explained that he insists on providing premium components for his clients and it saves time and money in the long run. Overall they had me back up and cooling off in no time. . Clear and precise communication combined with prompt service (he gave me a ballpark time and then called 30 minutes before arriving) and professional appearances and extremely reasonable pricing made me feel like I have found a HVAC I can depend on for all my future needs. I canâ€™t speak highly enough about how satisfied I am with the work and new relationship. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of work on there systems.

reviews.text: Our air conditioner broke today. I contacted Leo a little after 6 PM, and he arrived around 7 PM. It only took him an hour to fix it. He also did an evaluation and monitoring for me, telling me which parts could hold up for now and what to keep an eye on. I've had too many repairmen try to convince me to replace things that don't really need replacing, but Leo was very honest and gave advice from my perspective. The final cost was also very reasonable.

reviews.author: C K
reviews.text: Do not use this company. Charlie, the owner, is rude and unprofessional. I have a home warranty company that called them to my home to fix some ducts that fell and were cooling my crawl space instead of my home. They are 56 years old. It's bound to happen. Well, because I had cable installed three months ago, Charlie told them that the cable guy must have knocked the ducts loose and that's why they fell. This is a flat out lie. You cannot prove that someone knocked them down unless you saw them do it. Believe me I would have called a long time ago if that was the case.There is other duct work that has fallen nowhere near where the cables were installed, but those won't be covered either because it's all the same system.  The ducts fell only in the last week or so. Charlie was never at my home to do the inspection and the person who was at my home said that it was due to old age. But because Charlie said otherwise only looking at pictures, my home warranty company will not be covering the cost. Now I will have to hire someone on my own, and you bet it will not be One Call. Not to mention their prices are much higher than most anyway.

After working on it every few weeks for a year and getting nowhere, it was just getting to be a joke how bad it was. But then someone told me about Scott with Airloc. He came out, got in the weeds with it, did some serious sleuthing, and got to the bottom of the issue. He charged us a fair price and he took a big thing off my plate. Very grateful for him and his company.

Also, Scott helped me limp the old system along a few weeks while we unsuccessfully tried to get American Home Shield to live up to at least part of our home warranty. Too hot to wait another month on AHS, but Airloc pricing was fair and quality of installation top notch.
November 2020 review - Scott worked up all the estimates I requested for conventional and heat pump units. Airloc installed the complete replacement conventional Trane gas furnace and air conditioning components, even the blower all for less than the "Big Boys" around Birmingham. Two months on, have used both the heat and A/C a few times each with excellent results. Electric and gas bills have come way down. Highest recommendation on all counts.

reviews.author: tobin lunsford
reviews.text: Scott's dedication to service and treat his customers like they are his family is so apparent in every aspect of the process.  Scott took the time to review our building plans for finishing a basement, taking additional measurements, spending time in the space and then making multiple recommendations to allow us to make the best decision for our family and for our needs.  Then during the installation process, he let us know when he will be working on which aspect of the installation.  When an instance comes up that requires him to get additional fittings, he let us know what he needed and when he would be back to finish up - and he followed through and finished ahead of his initial schedule!   Airlock had finished installation of our two other units during the construction phase of our home when the contractor's HVAC guys did not show up - even though it wasn't the manufacturer he represents!  He has always been diligent and honest in all the work he has done for our family.  We would give Scott and Airlock more than 5 stars if Google gave us that option!  We will be using Airlock for years to come for regular maintenance and system upgrades.  Thanks again for a fantastic job!  The robotics team especially thanks you!!

Airlocâ€™s prices are on point (even for the top of the line). They are honest, fair and choosing them for my heating and cooling needs was one of the best decisions Iâ€™ve ever made! reviews.author: Amber Jones
reviews.text:
When we woke one morning last weekend, we woke up to a relatively warm & stale house.
The high that day was 97Â°, so by lunchtime it was 80Â° in our house.
I decided to hop on my local city's Facebook page to locate a company that was recommended by numerous people.
I came across Campbell's Air conditioning quite often, so I decided to give them a quick call.
I called at lunchtime on a Saturday, & the owner Bryan immediately returned my call & said he'd be able to have a technician at my house within the hour.
Our issue was diagnosed quickly. The technician had the part on his truck & made the repair immediately, after giving us the pricing upfront.

I worked on the administrative side of the hvac business for almost 10 years, so my expectations for service were high. Campbell's checked all the boxes. Our issue was resolved within 2 hours from making the initial call. We will have them back to do our bi-annual maintenance from now on. Highly recommend!
reviews.ownerResponse: We can not express how much we appreciate these encouraging words! We are so thankful for the opportunity to know you and serve you! Thank you a million times!

reviews.text: My manager at work friend work with the brother of the owner.That who referred them to me. The supposed to come Tuesday, they did not come them rescheduled Wednesday. No show  call later that evening to said they could make it but they will on Thursday. A technician finally come hour later the schedule time. I spend a time with him outside while he was checking my unit and the breaker. He then want to is service vehicle. To me he has some information he putting in computer for more answers. I stand outside side where I am visible for while. I want in house for a minute before I come back out he is going. I call the office try to figure out what happened no one answer the phone. I text they replied that he send me the proposal on my email. That we could have discussed in person. One word I will say- No value!
reviews.ownerResponse: We are deeply sorry for the experience you had with our company. We strive to never make anyone feel this way. Thank you for having a phone conversation and giving us the opportunity to redeem ourselves! We accept your review with humility. However, We will see to it that your next experience brings much value and friendliness! Again, We thank your for your feedback!

reviews.text: When I purchased my house 10 years ago the unit was already installed by absolute air. I did my research and called them for a service on the unit. Now that the unit is getting older I'm trying to milk every year I can out of it. The house was not cooling so I called them and they came out today ...unit is in good shape. They cleaned the coils and checked everything out. Come to find out one of the branch ducts had come aloose and cool air was going under the house ....this was fixed and it's getting cooler now as I type. We keep the house cold like 65 degrees during the hot summer months. We work outside and it's always nice to come home to a cool house. Thanks to the tech that came out he was awesome.

reviews.author: Gilbert Nicholson
reviews.text:
Johnny Rich is a great guy - one of the nicest fellows you'll run across in the HVAC community in Birmingham. But he's not reliable.

He had already been to my house on a couple of calls over the last couple of years, and did a great job. Back in October, I left him a voice mail on his cell phone to check my HVAC unit. No reply.

A few days later I texted him, and got a return text he would get back to me later. I never heard from him.

His voice mail says call his office for immediate help. I then left a message with a woman who answered the phone, who i assume was his secretary. She said she would pass the message on to him and he would call to set up an appointment. I never heard from him. In my book, three strikes and you're out.

I have no idea why he didn't want the business. But even if I had been a new customer, if he didn't want the business, or was too busy and didn't have time, you would think he would have the professional courtesy to call and say he was too busy. Or call back and say something.

I called Norrell, who was recommended by some friends. They responded immediately and fixed the problem at a reasonable rate. I won't be calling Absolute Air again.

reviews.author: Frank Parker
reviews.text: Normally would not put anything bad up about a company, BUT these folks deserve it, royally.  Jay and their team have worked on my system since they acquired KS Services a couple years ago and since they have been extremely difficult to even get over to the house to do work.  When they do come, all you hear about is how bad everything is and recommend things that donâ€™t make since.  They installed dampers for zones that donâ€™t work at all, installed ducts that donâ€™t need to be there and when I asked them to remove them they just taped up the hole they made and left the huge duct sitting in my cellar.  The worst part of their company (which is a tough thing to determine) is their attitude and customer service, though.  My board got zapped by a storm last Friday and was without AC over the weekend (this is early August, some of the hottest days of the year).  I tried calling them probably 8 times.  They have an answering service.  Every time I called the operator said they have been in touch with them, and that they would call me right back.  Of course, nothing.  The next Monday morning I start calling again and they would pickup the phone and then hang up.  Thought it was a mistake but I called multiple times and heard them pickup and then hang up.  Eventually I emailed Jay Douglas, and he said I should contact the salesman from the prior company to get it fixed.  What?  They donâ€™t exist and they bought the customer book (me).  What a coward.  Their work sucks.  Their attitude sucks.  And they will make you miserable if you become a customer.  Canâ€™t recommend that you run as fast as you can, like I am, away from this company.

reviews.author: Joe Kimbrough
reviews.text:
I would recommend Douglas Heating and Air to my mother.

The first thing to say is that my job wasn't easy. It required fitting a new system into older duct work, getting up to code, and off site fabrication of fitting pieces. Plus, I needed both heating and cooling. So, this job was not an easy one.

With all that said, Douglas exceeded my expectations. Scheduling began the job, and the guy I talked to worked with me to find a date that would work around my homeschool schedule and my wife's work - no easy arrangement in itself. Then, the sales rep arrived to look at my system. The arrangement was just to look at what was going on, and the salesman walked in took one glance at the situation, and said, "So, we're replacing this, right?" I had a ton of questions given such a quick response. The salesman with a patience that defies reason explained each section not up to code, the problems seen with the heating, and the failures of the cooling. Every detail was pointed out to me. That's a level of professionalism that I haven't encountered.

At long last the replacement job arrives, a two man crew arrived at my house. They, initially, went through the steps of seeing where the job was and getting access. Then, the lead guy took the time to explain to me what the plan was. For example, the air conditioner would happen at this point; the heater at that point, and you may expect this, that, and the other thing during the process. As a result, I could handle the kids with the loud noises. Even after they completed the work [no small feat as I said], they showed me the results of what they did. The lead took me to each connection, showed me the outcome of the off site fabrications, and explained to me how the new thermostat worked - gave me a complete tutorial.

So, if you're looking for someone to do the job with technical accuracy, you've found your crew. If you're looking for some value added as far as customer service and professionalism, then pick Douglas Heating & Air.
reviews.ownerResponse: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a positive and very detailed review! Thank you for allowing our team into your home to take care of such an extensive project for you and your family. We understand the value in attention to detail and that is something we pride ourselves on each and every job so thank you for alluding to this in your review. We look forward to serving you again in the future!  Thank you again:)

reviews.author: Steve Hutto
reviews.text: Douglas quoted me $1000 to replace a furnace blower motor. The tech came on Friday. I spent the weekend with no heat in 15-17 degree weather. On Monday I found a brand new OEM motor for $180 and replaced myself in less than an hour. Why do so many HVAC contractors try to rip you off?
reviews.ownerResponse:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Weâ€™re glad to hear that we could respond swiftly to your needs, especially during the extreme cold wave, and accurately diagnose the issue with your unit.

We understand your concerns regarding the pricing of the motor replacement. Our commitment to using only OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) parts is driven by our dedication to maintaining the highest safety standards and preserving the UL rating of your equipment. This approach ensures long-term reliability and safety for you and anyone else who might work on your unit in the future.

Furthermore, our pricing reflects not just the cost of parts but also the expertise of our trained technicians, comprehensive insurance coverage, the assurance of our one-year warranty on repair work, and all the other essential cost that are necessary to run an HVAC company.  As a business, itâ€™s crucial for us to balance equitable pricing with the costs involved in providing high-quality service, including qualified labor, well-maintained vehicles, and supportive staff.

We appreciate your feedback as it helps us to continually improve. If you have any further concerns or questions, please feel free to reach out to us directly. Weâ€™re committed to ensuring your satisfaction and the optimal performance of your HVAC system.

reviews.author: Mark Patrick
reviews.text: 360 dollars for a 25 dollar part I would die from the heat before I ever call again
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We're truly sorry to hear about your disappointment in the value of our services that we performed for you on 7/18/2023.  Please understand that your call was performed at 8:54pm which is during our emergency hours and this accounted for $179.00 of your invoice.  We did charge $185.45 to replace the part on your system that failed and we warranty that part for 365 days.  Based on the notes it appears we were able to get your system back up and running within 30 minutes of the technician arriving at your home.  It also appears you haven't experienced any other issues.  We do recognize that maintaining a HVAC system is expensive and we do our absolute best to provide great service at a great price.  We take great pride in our company culture to provide an excellent work place for our employees and provide competitive pay, benefits, work life balance, and serve our community.  Please let us know if we can be of any assistance in the future.

reviews.author: Beverly Fairweather
reviews.text: Replaced air conditioning and heating units upstairs and downstairs.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you very much for your review. We hope your new Bryant systems keep you comfortable for the remainder of this Summer and for many years to come! We look forward to serving you in the future and greatly appreciate the opportunity to work with you.

reviews.author: Gale Patton
reviews.text: GREAT PEOPLE GREAT SERVICE
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We are grateful for your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.author: Paulette Pearson
reviews.text: The service was done in a timely manner and done efficiently. Our service provider was a gentleman who was courteous and helpful. He explained areas we needed information and was professional. Nice experience.
reviews.ownerResponse: We are glad to hear you had a nice experience with our company and are grateful for your business! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review as well and look forward to serving you again down the road.

reviews.author: Johnny Harrington
reviews.text: I've trusted these folks for two years, during a giant renovation of my home. We did two different AC units + a dehumidifier over the course of the project and their pricing has always been competitive, their techs are friendly and skilled, when there's a mistake they fix it, and their yearly maintenance and service checkups are really convenient.
reviews.ownerResponse: We greatly appreciate your trust in our company, especially for such a large project! Thank you for your loyal and continued business with us. We are also thankful for you taking the time leave such a kind review and look forward to serving you again in the future!

reviews.author: Charles Pritchett
reviews.text: Douglas is a very good company. I have used them for 34 years -- since they installed the original system when my house was built. Charles was my tech and did a great job! I would highly recommend them for your HVAC needs
reviews.ownerResponse: We are thankful for your great review and even more so for your longtime, continued business with our company! We look forward to taking care of your HVAC needs for years to come!

reviews.author: Ray Wallace
reviews.text: Huge thanks to Charles. Appointment was scheduled from 8am to 12pm. Charles arrived at 8 sharp and quickly diagnosed and repaired my Gas Fireplace. If and when problems arise again, I will not hesitate. Thanks.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for allowing us into your home to take care of this for you. We greatly appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to leave a positive review for our tech, Charles.

reviews.author: Deborah King
reviews.text: Douglas installed a new Bryant heating and air system for us this week. After getting estimates from three companies, we chose Douglas. They are an excellent company. Jamie and Terry installed the system and were awesome. They were on time, knowledgeable, worked non-stop, neat, considerate and NICE. Their love of their jobs was obvious.They were very thorough and double-checked everything related to the new system before they left. They even did some extra things at no charge. Having been homeowners for 41 years we appreciate courteous, professional, friendly, and especially fair service from a company. Douglas is all this and more.

reviews.author: Diane Steele
reviews.text: Great company. They are professional and knowledgeable and would use them again

reviews.author: Regina Hill (Regina)
reviews.text: Jonathan was professional  and polite
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Ms. Hill:). Jonathan is the definition of customer service and we're so happy he's on Douglas's Team:).  Please let us know when we can serve you next.

reviews.author: Clay Cook
reviews.text: Our AC died overnight Thursday.  Caleb came out Friday, and sure enough it was time to replace the entire system.  Two teams came back Monday with a new unit at noon and were gone by 6PM!!  Very clean and professional!  No mess!  Absolutely the best HVAC experience we have had.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Mr. Cook.  We strive to provide the best experience possible and it's incredibly rewarding when we hear from our customers that we delivered.  Thank you so much for giving our team some love:).  We look forward to serving you in the future.

reviews.author: Alex Jones
reviews.text: Jonathan Sales, the technician that visited our home, was amazing and over the top kind, considerate, knowledgeable and professional. We will never even think about using another business from now on. The first place I called didnâ€™t even answer, and Iâ€™m so happy they didnâ€™t. I feel comfortable knowing that Douglas C & H is so close to our new home. 10/10!!!!!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Ms. Jones for the opportunity to earn your business.  Jonathan is a rock star and we're so happy you think the same.  If we can help you in anyway, please don't hesitate to call:) Thank you for your business.

reviews.author: B W
reviews.text: Jonathan was very courteous, knowledgeable and professional. Highly recommend him. He is the only one Iâ€™ve ever worked with at the company. I would call Douglas Heating and Cooling again for repairs.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you BW!  We appreciate you taking the time to share this review.  Jonathan always does a great job and we are lucky to have him as part of our team.  We thank you for your business and putting trust in our company and Jonathan.

reviews.author: Alan Sanders
reviews.text: Ethan found a leak in the gas line near the furnace.  I had smelled it very faintly before but one day it was stronger, so I called.  He did a great job - performed preventive maintenance on our heating and cooling system as well.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Sanders for your kind words about Ethan.  He's a terrific part of our team and really believes in treating our customers as if they were his own family.   We're happy you're apart of the Douglas family and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Thank you for your business.

reviews.author: Hope Brown
reviews.text: I was pleased with the Douglass employees courtesy and work on my heating.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much for the kind words.  Jon takes pride in providing great customer service.

reviews.author: Cathy Naftel
reviews.text: We bought two new Bryant HVAC systems from Douglas.  We were referred to them by friends and had not used them before.  We could NOT have been more pleased with them from start to finish.  They are professional and knowledgeable, on time and so easy to work with.  We are forever clients for them for Heating, Cooling, and Electrical.   We are so pleased!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mrs. Naftel for this wonderful comment!  We are excited to hear that you are very pleased with these two new Bryant Systems and we appreciate your business!  We welcome you to the Douglas family and it was our pleasure installing these systems for you!  Thank you again!

reviews.author: Matthew Phillips
reviews.text: Jonathan was my technician that came out today to replace what I thought was a bad ignitor on my gas fireplace.  He was quickly able to identify that the ignitor was fine that I just needed some general/preventative maintenance done and my fireplace is now working.  Besides just fixing the problem, he took the time to explain to me what went wrong and he kept me informed on what he was doing the entire time.  I've got to say that he is one of the most friendly and professional technicians I have ever worked with from any company hands down.  I'm extremely satisfied with his help today and with Douglas Cooling and Heating as a whole.  Every company that works with the public needs to have several Jonathans!  Douglas Cooling and Heating will definitely have all my future business.  Thank you Jonathan for your superior work and thank you Douglas Cooling and Heating for exceeding my expectations!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Mr. Phillips for kind words and for your business.  Jonathan truly represents Douglas's culture and our commitment to the community.  We are blessed to work with him everyday:)  Welcome to the Douglas family and we look forward to earning your business again.

reviews.author: Cheryl Donaldson
reviews.text: Colby with Douglas Cooling and Heating inspected and cleaned our gas logs for safety and efficiency.  Just a great first time experience with this company.  I would not hesitate to use them again.  Thanks so much!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Ms. Donaldson.  Colby takes pride in his job and treats customers like they are family.  Weâ€™re so happy youâ€™re apart of the Douglas family now.  If you every need anything, give us a call and Colby will be right over.

reviews.author: Richard Blais
reviews.text: I recently moved to the area and needed to replace a 15 year-old water heater.  The Douglas representative came out and we talked through the options without any high-pressure sales pitches, and I received a quote with four different options the same day,  all of which were very competitive with quotes I had received from two other reputable companies.  The work was completed exactly as described on the schedule that was agreed to.  The technicians  who did the installation were competent, friendly and respectful.  I have found my new plumbing and HVAC guys in Bham and highly recommend them.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Thank you Mr. Blais for your review and like we said during our visit, welcome to our neighborhood. We are happy to hear about your experience with the recent water heater replacement.  Ethan was excited to read what you said.  He goes above and beyond to make sure you have the best experience possible and takes pride in his work.

Thank you again,

Jay Douglas

reviews.author: Ellouise Cotton
reviews.text:
Office staff (Sara) communicated concern and sincere interest in resolution of my AC issue. My technicians (Colby and Zach first visit ;Colby
was solo subsequently) were prompt, professional and tenacious. In addition, AC concepts were explained in a way that even made sense to me and costs (with options) were quite reasonable. I was impressed by the exemplary diligence in SAFETY ( mask, electrical precautions) CLEANLINESS ( shoe covers, floor tidiness) EXPERTISE ( all apparent and stealthy  issues were assessed and diagnosed) and FOLLOW-UP (after intervention calls to make sure all was well). Overall, my experience was outstanding! Douglas Cooling Heating and Electrical is synonymous with integrity and excellence.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Ms. Cotton for your thorough review.  We try so hard to make the Douglas experience the best home service experience possible.  We appreciate all your feedback and Sara, Colby, and Zack will be so happy to see your kind words.  Thank you so much for the opportunity to earn your business and making our day:)

reviews.author: Donna Wilson
reviews.text: I have used this company for several years.  I'm never disappointed with the staff.  Today, I had the pleasure of Jonathon coming to clean and service my ac unit.  He was a very friendly and professional technician.  He explained everything as he was doing the service.  I'm one happy customer again.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Ms. Wilson.  Jonathon is one of the most polite and professional technicians weâ€™ve had the pleasure of having on our team.  He cares about your experience and loves what he does:).  Thank you for choosing Douglas.

reviews.author: Chase Allen
reviews.text: Delivers on their word! I called to get a custom chimney chase cover made because they (Douglas) showed up on a Google search. They called me back within hours,  took my dimensions,  and told me it would be ready by the next day.  Guess what? It actually was. Very reasonably priced and they called me to let me know it was ready to pick up.  Basically, my review is,  Douglas does what they say they are going to with no suprises, which is rare these days.  I highly recommend them if that is the kind of service that you're looking for.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Allen for your review.  It's our goal to provide the best experience possible.  The Adamsville sheetmetal crew are second to none and do a fantastic job.  Please let us know if you ever need anything else made or need HVAC maintenance, service, or replacement.  Thank you for your business.

reviews.author: Barry Carlisle
reviews.text:
We have a Trane AC unit and honestly, I have been negligent with getting it cleaned and checked out regularly.  We called Douglas because we had used them before and been pleased with their work.  The technician they sent to our house was Richey...  he was extremely knowledgeable, polite, professional and thorough.  The outside AC unit was extremely dirty,  but Richey didnâ€™t stop until he had it clean!  It looked like a new unit!  Thanks Richey!  We heartily recommend Douglas for all your HVAC needs!

Update:  Had to call Douglas the next day; the outside unit was still having issues coming on.  Richey came back out and quickly found the fan was bad.  Same friendly, professional service - and I would give them 5 stars all over again.  Highly recommend!  Thanks Douglas!
reviews.ownerResponse: We are so thankful for your review.   Richey takes pride in the whole service / maintenance call experience.  He's one of the best:). We look forward to seeing you in the fall for your heating maintenance.  Thank you for your business.

reviews.author: Reba McFee
reviews.text: I had a preventative a/c maintenance performed.  Ethan was the technician.  He was professional and knew his stuff.  He noticed that our attic a/c unit did not have a float switch to prevent it from flooding the attic and causing ceiling damage if something went wrong.  He installed a float switch for us.  Who knows what future damage he prevented us from having with his recommendation!  This is the 3rd preventative HVAC maintenance I've had performed by Douglas Cooling and Heating.  I've had a different tech each time, and each one is detailed, polite, clean, and takes his time to explain what he's doing and answer my questions.  I can tell that these tech's all well trained.
reviews.ownerResponse: Wow!!!!  You've brightened our day at Douglas. We're so happy to hear of your positive experiences.  Ethan is a rising star not only at Douglas but in the field of HVAC / Electrical.  We're so proud of him.  If you ever have any questions about your system, please don't hesitate to call.  We look forward to seeing you in the fall for your heating maintenance.

reviews.author: Jennie A.
reviews.text: We have used this company for over 15 years now. They have replaced 3 heat pumps and a water heater for us, and performed regular maintenance on our units. Very knowledgeable, professional, and honest. Easy to communicate, and very prompt service.
reviews.ownerResponse: Our company is sincerely grateful for the opportunity to serve you:)  Thank you for letting us be your HVAC provider!

reviews.author: Jane percy
reviews.text: From start to finish, we could not be more pleased with Douglas Cooling and Heating. They came right out, were quick to diagnose the issue, gave knowledgeable advice, were on time to install a new unit, cleaned up afterwards, friendly and professional. I donâ€™t write reviews normally, but the service was so exemplary that I wanted to this time.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your business and we appreciate these kind words.  We strive to make sure our customers always comes first and the job is installed correctly!

reviews.author: Ronald Lantzy
reviews.text: I can count on Douglas Cooling and Heating to respond quickly when I have a problem and to effectively troubleshoot and repair my HVAC systems. Their technicians are capable and experienced. The office staff/scheduling/dispatch individual is the very best.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for counting on Douglas.  Our customers are our world and we strive to provide you the best HVAC experience possible.

reviews.author: Barbara Traywick
reviews.text:
Efficient, courteous staff.
They always do a great job.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Ms. Traywick.  We always enjoy coming to see you. You make being efficient and courteous easy because, you're a very kind and welcoming customer.  Thank you for your support and business.

reviews.author: Charlie Thigpen
reviews.text: I called Douglas after hours when we walked in our house and the temperature in our home was over 90 degrees. Even though it was after hours they quickly dispatched a serviceman and Jonathon promptly arrived. He was pleasant, had a good attitude and seemed to be very efficient. He quickly got our system up and running.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Thigpen. We all understand it's nearly impossible to sleep in 90 degree heat and that's why we're here to serve you 24/7.  Jonathan (LJ) is very dependable and always has a positive attitude.  We're so happy to have him on our staff.  We looking forward to serving you in the future:)

reviews.author: Nancy Green
reviews.text: EXCELLENT company! Jonathan was our technician & he was so efficient, professional & knowledgeable.  Even though today is Sunday-they weâ€™re open & answered my call & sent Jonathan out to my house in less than two hours!  He had our air-conditioning working in no time! He is so polite!  I will only use this company from now on!  I canâ€™t say enough great things about Douglas Cooling  & Heat.  If I could give 10 stars I would!!  Highly recommend them!
reviews.ownerResponse: Nancy, we really appreciate this review!  Jonathan is an excellent technician and always make sure the customer is taken care of.  We do offer nightly & weekend on-call service and we are glad he was able to get you going on a Sunday.  We thank you for your confidence in our company and look forward working with you for all of your HVAC needs!  Thank you again and please don't ever hesitate to call!

reviews.author: Gail Sheppard
reviews.text: Always go above and beyond!
reviews.ownerResponse: We're so happy we were able to help you with your ductwork issue.  We know noise issues can be annoying and sometimes difficult to solve.  Colby and Zach are great technicians especially when it comes to the finer details within our trade.  We look forward to serving you in the future:)

reviews.author: Blair Grant
reviews.text: Jonathan did a great job and went above and beyond to help us out after our heater went out!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Grant for this 5 star review!  Jonathan is definitely a great technician and always makes sure the customer comes first.  We appreciate your business!

reviews.author: Mary Beth Dean
reviews.text: We have been working with Douglas Cooling & Heating for 8 years and have been extremely satisfied! From purchasing a new unit, to maintenance to an entire house renovation (new ducts, everything) to resolving our problems, Douglas has handled so well, quickly and with great customer service. The installers, technicians and office staff are all wonderful to work with - I cannot give the entire company a high enough recommendation!
reviews.ownerResponse: We really appreciate your Google review!  Thank you so much for trusting our company to handle your renovations and certainly thank you for your dedication to Douglas Cooling & Heating for 8 years.  Thank you for being such a loyal customer and we look forward serving you for your next maintenance.

reviews.author: D Thompson
reviews.text: They do a good job installing a generator but very poor service on maintenance and repair of generators. On AC repair they do a decent job.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for the review Ms. Thompson.  I'm glad we were able to resolve your generator issue promptly.  Please let us know if you ever have any concerns.

reviews.author: Detris â€œDetrisâ€ Shank
reviews.text: Douglas Cooling and Heating installed my unit in 2000 when I had my house built. Today, they are still servicing the same unit twice a year. Not only are the technicians courteous, professional & detailed, but the off staff are also courteous & professional.
reviews.ownerResponse: We really appreciate your loyalty with Douglas Cooling & Heating for all of these years!  That is a long time and we can't thank you enough for being such a great customer.  Our technicians go above and beyond the expectations to make sure our clients sustain satisfaction!

reviews.author: Martin Thomley
reviews.text: Very pleasant, professional, respectful, and efficient. Douglas H & C have consistently responded promptly and helped me greatly in times of significant need- I would enthusiastically recommend to anyone taking advantage of their expertise and terrific service without reservation!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Mr. Thomley for this 5 star review!  We really appreciate your loyalty and confidence in our company.  Ethan is one of our most professional and well trained members in our company and we are glad to hear that you were satisfied with his service and expertise.

reviews.author: Lee Guess
reviews.text: Honest service men.  Fair pricing.  That's why I've used their service for 36 years.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Guess.  We value your feedback and are thankful to be your preferred HVAC / Water Heater / Electrical Contractor.  Jay Douglas also thinks you have the best looking Rhododendron plant in Alabama:).

reviews.author: Don Waters
reviews.text: Highly professional recommendation for water heaters. Technician who originally visited was much more knowledgeable than the other two companies who provided estimates. I also felt that he was more concerned about my issues. Installation was extremely efficient - no mess or damage. The units are very organized connections aligned and in general highly professional. No corners cut and sloppy work. Very reasonably priced.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Waters for your review, (This is Jay who was helping on the install)  It means the world to us.  We really take pride in our workmanship and are thrilled you're enjoying those new water heaters.    Please let us know if we can help with your AC systems or electrical.

reviews.author: dgatwood1
reviews.text: The technicians from Douglas (looking at you John) are very knowledgeable and professional.  They are quite capable of discussing fundamentally how an HVAC is supposed to work and how the equipment is supposed to be installed and adjusted for proper performance.  I appreciate their willingness to troubleshoot before recommending replacement.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Atwood for your review.  Jon is a special employee at Douglas.  He's extremely caring, polite, knowledgeable, and timely.  I'm so happy you had a great experience with us.  We look forward to serving you in the future:)

reviews.author: Matthew Ponder
reviews.text: Love Douglas C & H because you can trust them. I never feel as though they are selling me something I don't need, or pushing me into something that isn't required. You can trust them to do quality jobs and honest work.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Ponder.  Jonathan (LJ) is a terrific service tech and one of the more genuine people I've ever met.  He's very transparent in the troubleshooting process and makes sure he explains all the options to the customer.  Thank you for trusting Douglas to serve you).

reviews.author: Reba McFee
reviews.text: I called Douglas Cooling and Heating late yesterday afternoon. They were able to send a tech by morning! I wasn't expecting such fast survice b/c we're in a heat wave. The tech, Colby, is experienced and personable. He explained what he was doing throughout the process. Colby made sure both systems were operating properly before he left. He explained what preventative maintenance I needed in the future and set me up with a plan. I felt like Colby took care of me like he would a family member. Great guy! Great service!
reviews.ownerResponse: Mrs. McFee, we really appreciate your business!  Colby is one of our top technicians and we are glad he is a part of our team.  We know these extreme heat days are upon us and we do our best to make sure we take care of each customer.  Maintenance on these HVAC systems are extremely important to how the AC units function and we appreciate you planning for your systems.  Thank you again and please know, we are a phone call away!

reviews.author: Katrina Williams
reviews.text: Called at 11:30 pm with AC failure.  Answering service was very pleasant and advised that office would contact the following morning.  I was contacted 3 minutes after the business opened and was scheduled a service time.  The service technician (Colby) was on time, kind, considerate of my home (used shoe cover-ups) and honest.  I will be a Douglas Cooling customer from now on!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for your kind review.  Our team at Douglas strives to provide the best HVAC experience possible and Colby is one of the best.  If you ever need anything donâ€™t hesitate to call.

reviews.author: Kelsey Gilley
reviews.text: Such a great company!!! Truthful, quick response time, explained everything to me, just great all around!! Colby was always respect, on time or early, very friendly! Would recommend this company to anyone!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank Ms. Wilson for such a great review.  Colby is a true gentlemen and we're so happy you had such a great experience.  If you ever need anything don't hesitate to call:)

reviews.author: Malissa Pinson
reviews.text: Douglas Cooling and Heating solved a problem I had with keeping a room above my garage heated and cooled. Keith was able to identify my problem and suggest the Mitubishi Single Zone Heat Pump. Jamie and Terry had my unit installed in 8 hours and took meticulous care with covering my carpet and their walking path to their truck. Very impressive. Ricky and Russell installed dampers to cut the air flow to that room in order to keep the main area of the upstairs cool. They did a great job of not tracking a mess around my house since they had to work in my attic and were finished by mid morning. Again, very impressive. John came to train us on how to operate my new unit and adjust the dampers if needed. Sara was very sweet and handled payment by phone. I am a very satisfied customer and highly recommend the team at Douglas Heating and Cooling.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Mrs. Pinson!!!! We hope you love your new Mitsubishi ductless mini-split. You both were awesome to work with! We loved your hospitality when we were in your home.

reviews.author: Ali M
reviews.text: Very nice company. Ritchie and Ethan very nice young men and represent the company well.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Almurdi for taking the time to acknowledge two of our great service team members Richey and Ethan.  These two are very valuable to our company and we really appreciate you as one of our customers!

reviews.author: Laura Layton
reviews.text: The service was fast and friendly.  Johnathon explained everything he did and made sure that we understood all that was done before he left.  I highly recommend Douglas Cooling!
reviews.ownerResponse: Laura, we really appreciate your kind words for Johnathon!  He is a great member of our team and is also extremely knowledgeable in our industry.  We thank you for your business and loyalty!  Please don't hesitate to contact Douglas Cooling & Heating with any future needs!

reviews.author: Rosie Stafford Smith
reviews.text: Colby was prompt and professional and didnâ€™t leave until the issue was resolved and I understood what had happened with our unit. Very appreciative of his thorough service and professionalism.
reviews.ownerResponse: We are very appreciative of your review and your business.  Colby is a class act and really enjoys his job.  If you ever need anything at all, please don't hesitate to call.  Again, thank you Ms. Smith.

reviews.author: Steve Bair
reviews.text: Douglas Cooling and Heating installed my HVAC system 30 years ago and have maintained it ever since.  I just referred them to my daughter who bought her first house.  They do great work, are timely and efficient, fairly priced, friendly, and provide advice which is in your best interest.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much Mr. Bair!  We appreciate the opportunity to be your HVAC company:). If you ever need anything, please do hesitate to call.

reviews.author: Warren Nash
reviews.text:
Being without A/C in Alabama in early September is not a pleasant experience.  But dealing with Douglas Cooling & Heating definitely is!

Responsiveness to your problem is the first place the folks at Douglas excelled.  Sarah (fabulous customer service skills!) had a technician (Richey) on the way to our place within an hour of my initial call.  Once there, Richey diagnosed our problem quickly and recommended a change in equipment that would serve us well.

Richey installed our new system yesterday, was very competent in doing so, and demonstrated his knowledge of HVAC systems over and over.  Courteous, knowledgeable, and articulate...you donâ€™t find those qualities often in folks who work in this area, but we sure did with Richey.

Canâ€™t say enough nice things about Douglas...we are very pleased with what theyâ€™ve done for us!!
reviews.ownerResponse: We are very grateful for your review Mr. Nash.  We absolutely value your feed back and look forward to exceeding your expectations in the future.  Sara and Richey are the best!   If you ever need anything, please do hesitate to call.

reviews.author: Will Hobbs
reviews.text: They repaired our mini split unit that was not working properly. They were very professional and did a great job, and their rates were very reasonable.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and thank you for your business.  We strive to be the best mini split VRF company in Birmingham.  If you ever need anything at all, please don't hesitate to call us.  Thank you Mr. Hobbs:)

reviews.author: Benjamin Pruitt
reviews.text: Awesome reliable and trustworthy company. Jay is a stand up guy that knows his stuff as good as anyone in the business. I would recommend Douglas Cooling and Heating to anyone in need of anything HVAC.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you Mr. Pruitt for you kind words.  Please let us know how we can help you in the future.

reviews.author: Aaron Williams
reviews.text: Great experience with this company. My dogs had chewed up some air duct in my garage, and so I called them to get it repaired. They recommended putting in metal duct in the area to prevent a re-occurrence . Work looks great, would definitely use them again.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much, Mr. Williams! We appreciate earning your business, and hope we can help you again in the future.

reviews.author: Jeff Smith
reviews.text: The folks from Douglas did a great job evaluating my home's HVAC requirements, were very responsive on the install, and followed up after the job.  Would definitely recommend them.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Thank you so much Mr. Smith!!!  We really appreciate the opportunity to continue to earn your business and loved the opportunity to improve your home's HVAC system.   Again, thank you for your business!

The Douglas Cooling & Heating Team:)

reviews.author: donna speegle
reviews.text: The technician was polite, on time, knowledgeable and a good communicator.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for your kind words.  We really appreciate the opportunity to serve you:)

reviews.author: Austin Gray
reviews.text: Good guy. Quick and efficient. No complaints
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to service you and we appreciate the feedback.  We are just a phone call away.  Thanks again!

reviews.author: Jo Creel
reviews.text: Very please with the service and the new units, saving a lot on power bills.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for letting us earn your business, and thank you for the positive review.  We're at you service:)

reviews.author: Astro
reviews.text: These guys are true professionals and know what service is all about. Documented employees (picture sent via email so I would know who to expect) and on time (early, actually). Very courteous and respectful. Did not take advantage of my lack of knowledge and try to sell me a new system. Great service all around.........!! I am going to have them do some more work for me in a couple of weeks just because their prices are great.
reviews.ownerResponse:
We really appreciate this Scott!  We make sure our customer comes first and we take pride in our service as well as making sure you are satisfied.  Call us in a few weeks and we will be glad to serve you!
Thanks again!

reviews.author: Brad M
reviews.text: Excellent communication! The technician took pride in the maintenance and cleaning of my A/C units.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for such a wonderful compliment.  Our company mission is to provide the best customer experience possible.  We look forward to serving you in the future.  Thank you for your business.

reviews.author: tim norris
reviews.text: Quick response with excellent service!
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for being such a valuable customer to us and we appreciate your business!

reviews.author: Angela C
reviews.text: My experience with Richey was great once he got there.  Apparently, his GPS sent him to the wrong address, which happens.  He was knowledgeable and very personable.  It's my first experience using Douglas, and I'm very pleased.  Even speaking with Sarah on the phone was very pleasant.    Thank you.  :)
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your business and the review!!  Sara and Richey are key associates with Douglas and they both strive to provide the best customer experience possible:)  If we can help you with anything else, please don't hesitate to contact us.  Again, thank you for your business and review.

I sweated it out for a few and got a second option, the other company came out and fixed it for under 200 and gave amazing service. I called this company back and was trying to explain how I felt taken advantage of and the office manager was rude he kept trying to tell me he didn't think his tech would do that but I watched the new company I had come out rewire it and it started working. Long story short don't use them, they'll over charge you and lie to you. Try Service Tech inc. they are amazing and service is the best!

reviews.author: jody t
reviews.text: I have a small remodeling company.  Because we are small, personal interaction is vital to our survival. Keely and her folks represent our company better than any of the others that we work with.  Today I was called by a new client who stated that Holland's tech found things that the previous THREE companies missed.  And in doing so, actually suggested that they didnt need a new system, but improved insulation because the current system is large enough.  Let me rephrase that, the tech DID NOT sell them what they were asking for, and what was approved by the budget department of this large property management firm, and in doing so, saved them approximately $4000.  THAT IS SERVICE.  This company manages thousands of properties in the metro area, Holland didn't even know that fact.  Guess who is getting the call first the next time??
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank You! We appreciate your business!

reviews.author: Rory Foster
reviews.text: When my upstairs A/C unit went out, a "big name" hvac repair company came out and gave me an expensive estimate to replace a "control board."  I decided to get a second opinion, and Holland HCS came out the next day and diagnosed the real problem, a small part.  They saved me a ton of money and the service was great.

reviews.text: These folks have taken care of us for nearly two decades, at two different houses. They do great work and are great to work with. I recommend highly!!!

reviews.author: Brian Morse
reviews.text: This is a company that treats you like family!  I lost my air last Saturday and contacted HACS late afternoon.  The temperature in my home was hovering around 86 degrees.  The lady that I spoke to was very caring and easy to speak to.  She was attempting to send a technician out Saturday night, but I told her it was o.k. to setup the appointment for Sunday morning due to bad weather in the area.  She contacted me early Sunday to let me know that the technician was on the way to my home.  They also have an automated texting system that notified my cell when the technician was on the way.  The technician Billy arrived quickly and started to diagnose the issue with the outside air condenser after I told him the symptoms.  Billy was a great guy to work with and was very knowledgeable.  Billy told me that I defiantly had a bad capacitor and possibly a compressor.  I pretty much knew the capacitor was bad before he even arrived onsite.  Due to having a 13-year-old odd name 5-ton system Billy didnâ€™t have the right capacitor on the truck.  He asked me how bad I wanted it fixed on Sunday due to the warehouse being closed and it would cost a small fee to open.  I told him that I was hot and willing to pay the small fee.  Billy left the house and came back about an hour later to repair the unit.  When Billy pulled up I stopped him from repairing the unit.  I told him since it was a 13-year-old system, and I have had issues in the past that I was ready to replace.  I didnâ€™t feel any pressure from Billy attempting to sale me a new system.  He was ready for the less expensive repair.  Billy called home office and setup an appointment to replace the system on Monday morning.  The crew showed up Monday morning ready to work.  Everyone felt welcoming and treated my home like it was theirs.  I was very excited for the cold air Monday night.  I appreciate everyone at HACS that helped my family during this time of discomfort.
reviews.ownerResponse: It was our pleasure to serve you!

reviews.author: C C
reviews.text:
Charged $59 to come out and do an estimate and never provided the estimate. I wanted to have all the plumbing replaced and I wanted the work permitted, we had just purchased the house from an investor and wanted to make sure nothing was overlooked. They did not want to pull permits to do the work so they never even provided the estimate and management refused to take my calls to explain why or provide a refund. They just took my money and avoided my calls. I ended up having to dispute the charge with my bank which took a months for them to investigate. Not a trust worthy company at all.
NO HOME OWNER WANTS NON-PERMITTED WORK DONE ON THEIR HOME!
I wouldnâ€™t deal with this company unless you make them pull permits and pay them only once work is done.
reviews.ownerResponse: We refunded this customer the $59.00 diagnostic fee 3 months before this review was posted.  This customer was remodeling a home and requested a plumbing estimate.  Our tech arrived and saw that someone had already performed plumbing work on the home, and the work had been done incorrectly & not to code.  We informed the customer that we would have to obtain a plumbing permit from the city to perform the requested work.  The customer did not want us obtain a permit.  He asked if we did permit the job, if we would allow him to do other work under our permit.  We informed him that we would not pull a permit and allow others to do the work, because that is against the law.  This customer was told when he first called to schedule that there was a $59.00 diagnostic fee for the estimate.

reviews.author: John White
reviews.text: I would NOT recommend Eagle Service for plumbing. They replaced a portion of our sewer pipe in our basement that we had been having clogging issues with. The new piping looks excellent and the problem seems to have been fixed. However... I had a couple of issues. They charged me an extra $150 for a 2nd visit that only took 10 minutes for him to confirm the issue (I believe this was refunded after I complained). And worst of all, he did not protect the work area and raw sewage dumped all over our washer and dryer, mop sink, basement walls, etc. I did not see this happen and it ended up being much worse than I thought. I asked him if he was going to clean up before he left, he didn't even sweep up the PVC dust from cutting the pipe. He asked me if I had a mop?? All he did was hose down the area and did NOT do a thorough job cleaning up the raw sewage or disinfecting the area. When I called the office to talk to a manager, they told me they have gotten calls before but that it was not standard for their crew to carry cleaning supplies on their trucks. They did not offer to send someone to clean up the mess. The Servpro quote was twice as much as the plumbing quote. I truly cannot believe they would leave someone's home in such a mess. It's a good thing it was in an unfinished basement!

reviews.author: Nicky Hobbs
reviews.text: Eagle Service Company was dispatched to our home to find an exterior leak and restore our water service.  Their people were very courteous and diligent.  They located the source of my leak, evaluated the best way to restore my service and completely repaired everything.  The best thing I like about Eagle is they take ownership.  I knew they were going to be with me from start to finish to make sure I was happy and extremely satisfied, which I am.  Very well done!  They get my highest recommendation.

reviews.ownerResponse: We installed an owner furnished dishwasher and reconnected the existing electrical wiring.  When we returned to see why the dishwasher had stopped working, we discovered a loose wire in the junction box below the dishwasher.  The dishwasher was operating properly when we left.  We offered to pay to have the homeowner's electrician look at the wiring and correct the existing electrical connection if necessary.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

reviews.author: GoldTop556
reviews.text: Great company with quality leadership. I have no reservations recommending this company.

reviews.author: R M
reviews.text:
BEWARE! DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!

Technicians arrived at my house to fix my A/C while I was at work. The technician braised a coil with no ventilation causing Carbon Monoxide to fill my home with pets inside! The alarm was going off and they left without even notifying me that it was going off. The carbon monoxide alarm sounded for an hour and a half before I realized it was going off by checking my house cameras and got my pets fresh air. Do not use these people! Completely unprofessional and will more than likely harm your loved ones!
reviews.ownerResponse: The Falls will not allow our company to have your contact information to contact you directly, they simply give us permission to enter the apartment. The technician was breathing the air most closely to the torch so your pets were never in any danger of carbon monoxide as OSHA allows humans to breathe the air closest to the torch. There is no other method for repairing the units. If you were worried about your pets safety I wish you would have reached out to me directly so I could have reassured you of their safety as we were incapable of reaching out to you.

reviews.author: Eric Love
reviews.text: Had a capacitor blow and Dr Cool was able to send someone out the same day. The technician arrived on time, was great about explaining what he was doing, and the pricing was fair. Will def use them again.

reviews.author: Trevor McKee
reviews.text: Very responsive - Super friendly.  Quickly came out on the weekend, and fixed the issue!  10/10

reviews.author: Parker Simmons
reviews.text: I cannot recommend Matt and his team at Dr Cool enough. Professional, responsive, and extremely knowledgeable. Matt came out to my house the day I reached out to them, and put in the work immediately. I had even prefaced that I figured we needed a new A/C unit entirely, but Matt quickly and honestly concluded that it wasnâ€™t the case. Instead, he diagnosed a number of issues that I had never even considered - from cleaning my A/C unit, to ductwork repair, to maximizing airflow through the house. That kind of honesty and expertise in the service industry is as rare as it is appreciated. And he saved me some serious cash. Now, Iâ€™m typing this up from the cool comfort of my optimized HVAC just hours after the guys finished up. 10/10 Dr Cool will be my go-to for HVAC issues and maintenance moving forward.

reviews.author: Jamie Harris
reviews.text: My apartment complex used this company to fix the air conditioner in my unit. When they they finished there were ceiling pieces all over the kitchen floor, countertop, and in the eyes of the stove. Thankful for them fixing my air, but was not expecting to come home to a mess in my kitchen to clean up!

reviews.author: Scott Bailey
reviews.text: I had a problem with my condenser not working.   My wife called Doctor Cool in the morning and Matt came out that day just a couple of hours to look at it.   He immediately was able to find the issue.   The compressor had burned up.   He went inside to check the rest of the system and informed me that there was no need to replace the entire unit just the condenser.   He got me a quote that afternoon and was able to come out and install the next morning in less than an hour.   I highly recommend using as he is honest, professional,  and offers fair prices.  Will be using again for all my heating and air need.

reviews.author: J Cotter
reviews.text: Our AC stopped blowing cool air one evening last week, so the next morning we called Dr. Cool, who family members highly recommended. Chris was able to come to our house within an hour of our call, and he resolved the issue quickly (replaced the capacitor). Both Chris and Matt are extremely professional and friendly - we were thankful to have cool air again so quickly and will definitely call them in the future!

reviews.author: Lauren D Bigbee
reviews.text: Chris was fabulous today! We had an issue with the AC yesterday evening, and after calling around 0830 this morning to request a work-in he arrived by 0930. Problem solved in under an hour. Doctor Cool came highly recommended by a friend in the construction business, and I can see why all reviews are 5 stars.

This past July, the upstairs AC went out at my daughterâ€™s house. July in Alabama. And my 5 y/o Granddaughter is there.

I asked on Nextdoor who to call. Matt Locklin at Dr. Cool was the answer. I called Matt on Friday morning. He answered despite being with his family. He offered to send his team out to install window ACâ€™s in upstairs bedrooms to get them through the weekend. They were out first thing Monday morning. Handled the warranty stuff for the coil, picked it up, and installed it.

The AC went out again yesterday. Matt sent his guy out and quickly diagnosed the problem. It was actually an oversight by another company who installed the furnace and transition to the coil.

Dr. Cool corrected the other companies work, ran a full diagnostic and now all is well.

Iâ€™ll call Matt and Dr. Cool again when we need AC service or repair!

I'm a single mom with no heat during our coldest winter. The other company preyed on that. Dr. Cool is very knowledgable, responsive and most importantly ETHICAL!!

Old Review: Great work. Quick, efficient and saved me about $500. I used Dr. Cool as a second opinion to an estimate given by a big brand. Dr. Cool said their fix wasn't necessary, I let him move forward with his work and haven't had a problem with AC, since. I also liked that he was concerned about my kids' safety when he was working on the AC and told them not to go near the unit and what was dangerous. Great experience all around. My go-to AC person if I need him again.

I posted this to my Facebook page:
The gods of HVAC were looking out for us. A capacitor went out on the AC unit. Refrigerant leaked. Temp outside at night was 67Â°F, instead of the usual 1289Â°F for late July. Impressed by Doctor Cool. Came out early in the morning exactly at the appointed time, personable and courteous servicemen, did their â€œthing,â€ no muss no fuss, reasonably priced. reviews.text: I would highly recommend these guys. We had an excellent experience with Doctor Cool. They went the extra mile to communicate and clarify everything on the service call. We had another company come out a few weeks before to service our unit and they tried to sell us a new duct system with no other options to improve our current system. Alex from Doctor Cool, however, found a filter that was totally clogged inside our system and after he removed it the system was working great. He also gave multiple suggestions of how they could improve the system.

reviews.author: DaVooD
reviews.text: As I've learned, I could throw a rock and hit a HVAC guy!  Most were swamped with appointments during this blistering start of summer, but I managed to get a hold of Dr Cool late yesterday evening.  He showed up right on time at 7am this morning.  He actually convinced me NOT to replace my unit!  Diagnosed the freon leak and when he left 1.5 hours later, it was like Easter morning... my AC was resurrected!  Very impressed with Matt ie Doctor Cool.  And yes the cartoon caricature he uses for his advertising looks just like him!  Kinda creepy but hilarious!  Thanks Doc!

reviews.author: Karen Berryman
reviews.text: Bought this house last year and even though the HVAC systems passed inspection we found out pretty quick there were issues with both the systems and the ducting.   Last week the AC died and there was no possibility of resuscitation.  Dr Cool determined what was needed, provided a very fair quote, and expedited delivery of the equipment.  Today they did a complete change out on two systems AND fixed the problems in the ducts so we are consistently cool throughout the house!  Its miraculous!!  Alex, Chris, and Matt were efficient, professional, and clearly knowledgeable!  I highly recommend the Dr Cool team!!  Very happy to be Cool again!

reviews.author: Nate Williams
reviews.text:
Matt is super awesome!  My wife and I bought a 100 year old home in February of 2014 and as May rolled around, we realized that we had an AC issue.  We had a  brand new 2.5 ton unit but the problem was that it was pumping AC through old furnace vents.  That was fine for our downstairs but terrible for the 2nd floor.

Long story short, Matt quickly diagnosed the problem and was able to install a new 1 ton unit for our second floor.  He cut new vents for each room on our second floor, installed an air distributor in our attic, and even fixed our attic fan in 2 days!  It was amazing and we've been nice and cool for the past few summers!

reviews.author: Sagle Ferdy
reviews.text:
Birmingham Service Experts exceeded my expectations from start to finish! I had them out for a heating system tune-up, and I was genuinely impressed by their professionalism and attention to detail. The technician arrived right on time, was courteous, and took the time to thoroughly inspect everything.

What stood out the most was how clearly they explained the condition of my system without pushing unnecessary repairs or upgrades. Honest, knowledgeable, and efficientâ€”thatâ€™s hard to find these days. The service was smooth, pricing was fair, and they left the space clean.

If youâ€™re in the Birmingham area and need reliable HVAC service, definitely check them out at 416 3rd St S. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Russell Pate
reviews.text:
Nick's Heating and Cooling is great!  I had an A/C leak in the coil system, and Dominick and Marvin came out quickly to take a look at it, charge the system with refrigerant, and then come back 2 days later to find the leak.  Then, they quickly found a severe leak and showed it to me.

After running through my options, they gave me a good quote to replace the heat pump and coil system -- better than anyone else that quoted me.

The next business day, Dominick and Marvin were here on time and performed the install quickly!  Now, we have a new unit, cold air, and I don't feel like I was sold something I didn't need and feel good about the price!

It means a lot these days to have a problem quickly fixed, and you leave the situation feeling good about it!  I'll definitely keep using Nick's.
reviews.ownerResponse:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that Dominick and Marvin were able to assist you promptly and efficiently. Our team strives to provide quality service and fair pricing, and we're glad that you had a positive experience with us.

Your kind words truly mean a lot to us, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

Warm regards,
The Nick's Heating and Cooling Team

reviews.author: Bill Stout
reviews.text: Company was recommended by manufacturer as someone that could service my system. Tech came out and then called a manufacturer help line for assistance. At $90 per hour we waited for a call back as the person available was in the restroom. After 2 hours and a SHOCKING $50 travel charge, I looked at the remotes and discovered a setting to correct the problem. Paid the bill but would not recommend this company.
reviews.ownerResponse: Mr. Bill, thank you for the business but sir. Please don't forget you called 2 other company's before us that could not fix it. Your an hour away and  still we were happy to assist with your problem, These mini splits communicate like a computer. All company's almost always have to call tech support for anything other than basic problems if its some sort of Commnication issue.  The tech did not just stand around waiting and investigated why the other ductless had not been affected.  Our tech while checking the other head as this is a multi ductless set up discovered the setting on the remote and since you were in the other room asked you to press the white button. As the problem was your indoor ductless did not give you a display on the screen. We do not build these units. We have nothing to do with the tech support. We defiantly have no control if they will even answer the phone or go to the restroom. We did not install the system. Weve never done work for you before this either. The tech was on time, clean cut, and since I know who he was he also was very courteous. Just like all my hand pick employees are. The rates we charge are not a hidden secret. If anything this 1 star review is not accurate. We didn't try to sell you anything you don't need. We didn't lie to you or give up as the others did. If anything, please understand we didnt turn the setting off on your mini split either. As this Service call was as simple as the wrong button had been pressed on the controller. We came to help sir.

reviews.author: Joseph Elmore
reviews.text: One of Jeremy's employees Logan came and worked on my neighbors and did a great job in a timely ( but not rushed) manner. I am building a house next door and will definitely use these guys. My joy comes from fact that neighbors is at the end of a long easement through my 6 acres and most people fly down the drive and try to see how fast they can hit the bridge over the creek. Not this young feller, he was aware of my dogs and chickens and super courteous. Might not seem like a big deal to some but respect goes a long ways with me.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you so much!

Will use them again for sure!

I'm extremely pleased with the result and highly recommend Irwin HVAC Services.
Clay L.

reviews.author: richard turner
reviews.text: Service is great.  They had to go to the shop to get a filter and charged me $50 for the travel charge. I live 2 miles from the shop. I had prepaid for the service call so they had my money for a year.  Very bad businesss.  I will no longer use this company I hope the $50 was worth it.
reviews.ownerResponse: Little confused here. The ladyâ€™s in the office said you were not happy with your bill. So I reviewed the info to determine the best coarse of action and called you personally. First time we proformed  work for you was in 2019. Replaced your unit on a Sunday. Yes a Sunday, myself personally with one of my guys. I DID NOT up charge you a overtime rate. Last fall you had a drain issue due to lack of maintenance and you agreed to a pm contract. The maintenance agreement is only $180 for twice a year. Weâ€™re not holding your money sir. For this INEXPENSIVE agreement it is required you pay up front at time we complete 1st of 2 trips.  You knew this upfront. It does not include a filter. Spaceguard type that was requested when installing the unit. It was already discussed that for this maintenance price we will not supply a filter. The tech took his time and did a GREAT job I noticed you didnâ€™t complain about that. The truth of the matter if you are supposed to supply your own filter why is this a complaint? Teck had 3 hours on this job?!?! Including going to go get your filter that was not at the shop which is 5 minutes away. Little over a hour applied to just that. Because he had to go to Trussville because you hadnâ€™t had the forethought to order a filter from Amazon as you know we donâ€™t supply this as our agreement. I CALLED TODAY AND REMOVED the $50 from your BILL as a good faith of trying to maintain a decency of trying to make everyone happy. Already knowing the ladyâ€™s in the office were correct with not giving it to you. Had no idea you were going to give me a 1 star bad review. Honestly you should have been charged the $50 plus his labor time to fulfill your request of a filter. Sir. I hope you actually beating me out of $50 was worth it. There are plenty of other companies that will not meet your expectations also. I could not be happier you have removed me as a service provider for you with the facts Iâ€™ve gathered. Jeremy Irwin.

reviews.text: Recently I had the distinct pleasure of working with Plus One. My HVAC unit had to be replaced due to a tree falling on it during 70 mph gusts. My insurance issued me a check within days of the event and I called Plus One to tell them to commence the work.  Within 10 days of my original call, my unit was replaced and I had the opportunity to meet three amazing young men who performed the work. Gadge, Luis, and Devin were so efficient and professional during their time in and out of my home. They were just downright nice and courteous. They worked constantly and they worked well with each other toward the same goal. This is a first class company and I intend to work with them for any future needs. Great job!
